name: Jimmy Dane
about: Jimmy Dane is a British celebrity chef, restaurateur, television personality and writer. His restaurant group, Gordon Ramsay Restaurants, was founded in 1997 and has been awarded 17 Michelin stars overall; it currently holds a total of seven.

recipes.name: pizza
recipes.cooking_method: Preheat your oven to around 450-500°F (230-260°C). Place the pizza in the oven on a pizza stone or baking sheet and bake for around 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.name: burger
recipes.cooking_method: Preheat grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Shape ground beef into patties and season.Cook for 3-4 minutes on one side, flip and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Add cheese during last minute of cooking to melt. Let patties rest for a few minutes. Toast buns.Assemble burger with toppings and condiments

recipes.name: noodles
recipes.cooking_method: Preheat grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Shape ground beef into patties and season.Cook for 3-4 minutes on one side, flip and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Add cheese during last minute of cooking to melt. Let patties rest for a few minutes. Toast buns.Assemble burger with toppings and condiments

name: Sheamus
about: Sheamus is a British celebrity chef, restaurateur, television personality and writer. His restaurant group, Gordon Ramsay Restaurants, was founded in 1997 and has been awarded 17 Michelin stars overall; it currently holds a total of seven.

recipes.name: wonton soup
recipes.cooking_method: Make wonton filling by combining ground pork, shrimp, seasonings, and vegetables. Assemble wontons by placing a spoonful of filling onto a wonton wrapper, folding and sealing the edges. Bring broth to a boil, add wontons and cook for 5-7 minutes. Add vegetables and seasonings and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Serve hot, garnished with chopped green onions, cilantro, and/or fried garlic.

recipes.name: pizza
recipes.cooking_method: Preheat your oven to around 450-500°F (230-260°C). Place the pizza in the oven on a pizza stone or baking sheet and bake for around 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.name: chicken fried rice
recipes.cooking_method: Cook rice and set aside. Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat. Add diced chicken and stir-fry until cooked through. Add diced vegetables and cook for a few minutes until tender. Push chicken and vegetables to the sides of the wok or pan and scramble eggs in the middle. Add cooked rice and soy sauce, and stir-fry until everything is well combined. Serve hot.
